sentence: Last year, U.S. Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Prescott, was the first sitting congressman to ever speak at the conference.
author: Jerod MacDonald-Evoy
title: Wendy Rogers, Kari Lake and Joe Arpaio listed as speakers at white nationalist conference

sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona, who last year stood in Greene’s place getting condemned for his speaking at both conferences, sent a video message to be played at AFPAC, as did Arizona state Sen. Wendy Rogers and Idaho Lt. Gov.
author: Kristen Doerer – Right Wing Watch
title: ‘Standard Bearer of Trumpism’ Marjorie Taylor Greene Bridges White Nationalism and the GOP

sentence: Sen. Mitt Romney, R-Utah, called Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., and Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., "morons" on Sunday after the two House lawmakers attended a white nationalist event whose participants heaped praise on Russia for invading Ukraine.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: "I have morons on my team": Mitt Romney blasts radical Republicans in Congress
